attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-1152

Date: 2003-07-28



                      Whereas, on October 25, 2002, the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (the Commission) rendered Telecom Decision CRTC 2002-67 entitled TELUS Communications Inc. — Application to review and vary

Decision 2000-745 and Decision 2001-238;


                      Whereas, on January 22, 2003, TELUS Communications Inc. (TELUS) presented a petition in writing to the Governor in Council pursuant to subsection 12(1) of the Telecommunications Act requesting that the Governor in Council vary certain aspects of that Decision;


                      Whereas, in accordance with subsection 12(4) of that Act, a notice of receipt of TELUS’ petition was published in the

Canada Gazette, Part I, by the Minister of Industry on

February 8, 2003;


                      Whereas, in accordance with section 13 of that Act, the Minister of Industry has provided an opportunity for provincial consultation;


                      And whereas the Governor in Council has considered

TELUS’ petition together with all information and advice received with respect to it;

                                                       

                      Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to subsection 12(1) of the Telecommunications Act, hereby declines to vary, rescind or refer back Telecom Decision CRTC 2002-67 of October 25, 2002 to the Commission for reconsideration.

(TELUS) presented a petition in writing to the Governor in Council pursuant to subsection 12(1) of the Telecommunications Act requesting that the Governor in Council vary certain aspects of that Decision;                        Whereas, in accordance with subsection 12(4) of that Act, a notice of receipt of TELUS’ petition was published in the  Canada Gazette, Part I, by the Minister of Industry on  February 8, 2003;                        Whereas, in accordance with section 13 of that Act, the Minister of Industry has provided an opportunity for provincial consultation;                        And whereas the Governor in Council has considered  TELUS’ petition together with all information and advice received with respect to it;                                                                               Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to subsection 12(1) of the Telecommunications Act, hereby declines to vary, rescind or refer back Telecom Decision CRTC 2002-67 of October 25, 2002 to the Commission for reconsideration.
